main event: An 11-year-old observer sighted a white light in the sky traveling slowly to the west on April 18, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The object was observed through toy binoculars., There was uncertainty regarding the nature of the object, with suggestions that it could be a balloon or an aircraft., The sighting occurred at 1:00 AM GMT local time., The investigator's conclusion pointed towards insufficient data for a definitive identification.
sighted object: a white light in the sky
